summary.introduction: I'm a software engineer with a deep passion for building AI/ML applications. I have extensive experience in solving complex problems using Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Data Analytics, Data Engineering techniques. I am currently leading the Machine Learning team at Programming.com to improve business processes in pharmaceutical research by leveraging Deep Learning, Generative AI, and LLMs. If you're looking to hire, collaborate, or require any assistance, drop an email.

bullets.point: Proficient in machine learning, AI, MLOps, deep learning, data science, computer vision, NLP, and LLMs.
Experienced in architecting and implementing data solutions at a petabyte scale, ensuring robust and scalable data handling capabilities.
Extensive experience in building cutting-edge applications, focusing on innovation, scalability, and robustness in healthcare, e-commerce, banking and technology domains.
Guided cross-functional teams, mentored junior members, engaged in stakeholder meetings for project acquisitions and proposals, and consistently delivered high-quality work.
Quick learner and ability to adapt to changing organizational goals and employ new ideas, concepts and methodologies.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
accomplishments: Designed an LLM-based enterprise RAG system that empowered business executives to efficiently search through thousands of internal documents.
Tracked treatment progress for over 500 vitiligo patients using deep learning and computer vision techniques.
Accelerated the clinical trial site selection process by 6 months through AI and deep learning methodologies.
Developed an AI-driven application for patient complaint analysis, leveraging NLP and deep learning, resulting in a 40% reduction in manual data processing.
Engineered an audio recognition app using cutting-edge AI embedding technology as a core product for a tech startup.
Established a real-time e-commerce analytical system, delivering BI reports promptly and expediting decision-making by over 4 weeks.
Conceptualized an app that automatically adjusts climate controls in cars based on personal preferences, leading to safer and enhanced driving experience.
Pioneered a groundbreaking predictive model using historical geospatial data, enabling next-generation smart cars to accurately anticipate and adapt to drivers' destinations.
Built an centralized MFA system, which standardized software security across the IT infrastructure.
Designed a fully functional Raspberry-PI based control system that significantly enhanced the efficiency and speed of lighting setup in movie studios.
Mentored and guided more than 10 interns and junior engineers across 5+ projects.
Led international cross-functional teams of up to 20 developers, successfully delivering 5+ projects.
Provided technical expertise in implementing and delivering over 12 projects to diverse clients.
Played a pivotal role in establishing and nurturing long-term business relationships with 3 different clients.

experience.title: Data Scientist
accomplishments: Developed a robust system for estimating energy consumption in data centers, resulting in optimized resource allocation.
Significantly enhanced the efficiency of next-generation data centers (DC 3.0) by implementing AI-driven strategies, leading to reduced operational costs and improved performance.
Key contributor in establishing the industry-standard TPCx-IoT benchmark, facilitating fair and accurate performance comparisons across IoT platforms.

experience.title: Big Data Engineer
accomplishments: Modernized the enterprise system managing 20+ petabytes of data using big data technologies, resulting in a 30% reduction in operational costs.
Designed an application to deliver targeted promotional offers based on customer behaviour.

experience.title: Security Software Engineer
accomplishments: Developed an application for secure over-the-air (OTA) firmware upgrades, ensuring reliable and efficient delivery to end users.
Introduced an algorithm to automatically scan code repositories and report security vulnerabilities.

experience.title: Research Engineer
accomplishments: Implemented an algorithm to accurately measure the severity of Parkinson's disease, improving diagnostic precision.
Devised a robotic arm for patient measurements and treatment analysis.
